txt.en: Your prowess on horseback is unrivaled, making you a much more formidable foe in combat. Your Lancer's Charge, Shield the Flank, and Halt the Charge skills are enhanced.
Lancer's Charge provides [placeholder] increased damage to unmounted units.
Shield the Flank: Reduces Incoming Damage by an additional [placeholder]
Halt the Charge will slow the enemy's attack speed by [placeholder].
